nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils

Class ActionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.ActionHelper

  • public final class ActionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains helper methods for struts actions
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Detail

      • back

        public static org.apache.struts.action.ActionForward back(org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping actionMapping)
        Returns an action forward to go back to the previous action

      • getByElements

        public static java.util.Collection<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getByElements(ActionContext context,
                                                                                   java.util.Collection<? extends Entity> entities,
                                                                                   ActionHelper.ByElementExtractor extractor)
        Extracts the elements from the entities and returns a map that might contain two items: the by element and the type of element. When the extracted element denotes a system task or an Administrator and the logged user is not an Administrator, only the type of element will appear in the corresponding map.

      • getParameterMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> getParameterMap(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        It returns the request's parameters map and in case of the error action it adds as a parameter the errorKey request's attribute.
        This is necessary because the sendError(ActionMapping, HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, String, Object...) method sets the errorKey as an attribute and send a redirect (to the error action) to the client
        See Also:
        sendError(ActionMapping, HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, String, Object...)

      • handleValidationException

        public static org.apache.struts.action.ActionForward handleValidationException(org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping actionMapping,

                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                               ValidationException e)
